document.full_text: wal-mart stores inc will re-open 12 of its seiyu stores in japan which were affected by the earthquake, and is hoping to open the remaining 12 impacted stores as soon as possible, a spokesman for the u.s.-based retailer said.
document.title: wal-mart to reopen 12 quake-hit stores in japan
lines_and_colors: wal-mart stores inc will re-open 12 of its seiyu stores in japan which were affected by the earthquake, and is hoping to open the remaining 12 impacted stores as soon as possible, a spokesman for the u.s.-based retailer said.
